price: Ibyo bahawe ngo babyinezezemo ntibyagira icyo bibamarira.
arabic: مَآ أَغۡنَىٰ عَنۡهُم مَّا كَانُواْ يُمَتَّعُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: mā aghnā ʿanhum mā kānū yumattaʿūna
